AbstractText: Tsel': vyiavit' vliianie fotodinamicheskoĭ terapii na zazhivlenie éksperimental'noĭ luchevoĭ iazvy kozhi, in fitsirovannoĭ Pseudomonas aeruginosa.Materialy i metody. Infitsirovannuiu luchevuiu iazvu modelirovali putem lokal'nogo rentgenovskogo oblu cheniia kozhi bedra krysy v doze 85,0 Gr s posleduiushchim naneseniem na poverkhnost' iazvy bakterial'noĭ vzve si Pseudomonas aeruginosa. Fotodinamicheskuiu terapiiu (FTD) provodili s pomoshch'iu fotonnogo apparata «Barva LED/630» i fotosensibilizatora metilenovogo sinego. Vliianie FDT na skorost' i kachestvo zazhivleniia in fitsirovannoĭ luchevoĭ iazvy opredeliali putem sravneniia pokazateleĭ gistologicheskogo i morfometrichesko go issledovaniia kozhi iz oblasti luchevoĭ iazvy zhivotnykh iz kontrol'nykh i lechennoĭ FDT grupp.Rezul'taty i vyvody. Nalichie Pseudomonas aeruginosa v luchevoĭ iazve privodilo k uvelicheniiu ploshchadi rane voĭ polosti po sravneniiu s neinfitsirovannoĭ luchevoĭ iazvoĭ i k sushchestvennomu tormozheniiu protsessov ee zazhivleniia. Prisoedinenie faktora infitsirovaniia snizhalo aktivnost' reparativnykh protsessov v luchevoĭ iazve na 20 % po sravneniiu s neinfitsirovannoĭ. Vozdeĭstvie fotodinamicheskoĭ terapii sposobstvovalo polnomu zazhivleniiu v srednem na odin mesiats ran'she, chem u zhivotnykh kontrol'nykh grupp.
OtherAbstract.CopyrightInformation: N. V. Krasnoselskiy, L. I. Simonova, V. Z. Gertman, E. S. Pushkar.

Article.ArticleTitle: Photodynamic therapy effect on healing of radiation skin ulcer infected with pseudomonas aeruginosa.

AbstractText: To reveal the effect of photodynamic therapy on the healing of experimental radiation skin ulcers infect ed with Pseudomonas aeruginosa.

The infected radionuclide was modeled by local X ray irradiation of the rat's hip skin at a dose of 85.0 Gy, followed by the application of Pseudomonas aeruginosa bacterial suspension to the surface of the ulcer. Photodynamic therapy (CTD) was performed with the help of a photon apparatus «Barva LED/630» and a photosen sitizer of methylene blue. The effect of PDT on the rate and quality of healing of an infected radionuclide was deter mined by comparing the histological and morphometric study of skin from the region of ulcer in animals from the control and treated groups of PDT.

The presence of Pseudomonas aeruginosa in the radiation sickness caused an increase in the area of the wound cavity compared with the non infected radionuclide and to a significant inhibition of its healing processes. The addition of the infection factor reduced the activity of the reparative processes in the radiation sick ness by 20 % compared with the uninfected. The effect of photodynamic therapy contributed to complete healing on average one month earlier than in control groups.
Abstract.CopyrightInformation: N. V. Krasnoselskiy, L. I. Simonova, V. Z. Gertman, E. S. Pushkar.

Article.VernacularTitle: VLIIaNIE FOTODINAMIChESKOĬ TERAPII NA ZAZhIVLENIE LUChEVOĬ IaZVY KOZhI, INFITsIROVANNOĬ PSEUDOMONAS AERUGINOSA.
